name: 石川ヒデキ
info:
• 简体中文名: 石川秀树
  • 别名: 石川秀樹
  • 别名: Hideki Ishikawa
  • 别名: Ishikawa Hideki
detail: Hideki Ishikawa (石川ヒデキ) is a character designer and illustrator who worked for Capcom regularly and is currently a freelancer.
